original_text: At the end of twenty years, in which Solomon had built the house of the Lord and his own house,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 여호와의 전과 자기의 궁궐을 이십 년 동안에 건축하기를 마치고

sentences.original_text: At the end of twenty years,
in which Solomon had built the house of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그 기간 동안 솔로몬이 주의 집을 지었고,
